column1: Title: Resident And Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order

Adjustment Type: N.A.

1st Order

Definitions and Footnotes:

Figures may not add up to the total due to birth order not reported.  Data are based on date of occurrence.  For births registered from 29 May 2022 onwards, birth order statistics are based solely on declared information.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order -> 1st Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order -> 2nd Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order -> 3rd Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order -> 4th Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Resident Live-Births By Birth Order -> 5th And Higher Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen or permanent resident.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order -> 1st Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order -> 2nd Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order -> 3rd Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order -> 4th Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Citizen Live-Births By Birth Order -> 5th And Higher Order (Number):
Refers to births with at least one parent who is a Singapore citizen.
Live-Births:
Data refer to all live births occurring within Singapore and its territorial waters as registered under the prevailing Registration of Births and Deaths Act in force at the material time.
Notation:
na   not available or not applicable
nec  not elsewhere classified
nes  not elsewhere specified
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Notes
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
Unit
Number
